definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: I want to withdraw 200 dollars from my  deposit account.
sentences.chinese: 我要从我的定期存款中支取200美圆。

sentences.english: My regular deposit is ended today ,may I continue ?
sentences.chinese: 我的定期存款今天到期，我可以续存吗？

sentences.english: Time deposits generally have a predetermined maturity and amount.
sentences.chinese: 定期存款通常具有预先规定的到期日和数额。

sentences.english: I'd like to have a three year time deposit in the amount of two thousand pounds.
sentences.chinese: 我想开一个两千英镑的三年定期存款帐户。

sentences.english: I think I’d like a deposit account.
sentences.chinese: 我想要开个定期存款帐户。

sentences.english: Laddering  certificates of deposit out six months is one way.
sentences.chinese: 存入六个月的阶梯式定期存款是一种方法。

sentences.english: The minimum deposit for a deposit account if 50 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 定期存款账户最低要50元。

sentences.english: The deposit can be time deposits of twenty thousand US dollars and above.
sentences.chinese: 您可以以两万美元或以上等值的定期存款作按金便可。

sentences.english: A negotiable certificate of deposit pledged with dgt as pledgee.
sentences.chinese: 设定质权人为电信总局之可转让定期存款单。

sentences.english: My fixed deposit is due to expire, can I continue it ?
sentences.chinese: 我的定期存款今天到期，我可以续存吗？

sentences.english: My time deposit is due to today, may I renew it?
sentences.chinese: 我的定期存款今天到期，我可以续存吗？

sentences.english: The rise was across - the - board , with demand , savings and time deposits all increasing.
sentences.chinese: 各类港元存款包括活期储蓄及定期存款均告上升。

sentences.english: It is considered that PBOC would like to encourage people to shift their money into fixed-term savings.
sentences.chinese: 市场认为，此擧旨在鼓励民众将资金转入定期存款。

sentences.english: A time deposit at a bank should be thought of as similar to a certificate of deposit.
sentences.chinese: 银行的定期存款就相当于一张存款单。

sentences.english: Dermot's putting his money by, in a Deposit Account.
sentences.chinese: 德莫特把钱存在一个定期存款账户里。

sentences.english: My fixed deposit is extinct today, cay I continue deposit?
sentences.chinese: 我的定期存款今天到期，我可以续存吗？

definition: certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
